1370: Harderico was born in St. Joris straet in 1370.
Got married to Rabburgis at age 21 in 1370.
1371: Had a son with Rabburgis, Stemaers, at age 22.
1372: Had a son with Rabburgis, Salomon, at age 23.
1374: Had a daughter with Rabburgis, Myrthel, at age 25.
1376: Had a daughter with Rabburgis, Eingeliadis, at age 27.
1377: Had a son with Rabburgis, Eligius, at age 28.
1389: Lost daughter Myrthel when Myrthel was 15 years old.
1390: Had a daughter with Rabburgis, Rycaldis, at age 41.
